General.Name: Promore Pharma AB
General.Description: Promore Pharma AB (publ), a biopharmaceutical company, develops peptide-based drug candidates in Sweden and internationally. Its product candidates include PXL01 that is in Phase IIa study for the prevention of post-surgical adhesions and scars, and for the prevention of dermal scars, as well as for tendon repair surgery in the hand; and LL-37, which has completed Phase IIb clinical studies for treating patients with venous leg ulcers, stimulate the healing of chronic wounds, and for the treatment of diabetic foot ulcers. The company was formerly known as Lipopeptide AB and changed its name to Promore Pharma AB (publ) in January 2017. Promore Pharma AB (publ) was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.
